New Day Text.Description: You can choose how to display the new day text. You can choose between: title, subtitle, chat, actionbar, disabled

Disabled Feature Text.Description: You can enable or disable the this feature is disabled text.

Sound Effect.Description: You can enable or disable the sound effect on new day

Calendar Block.Description: You can enable or disable the calendar block.

Calendar Item.Description: You can enable or disable the right click with calendar item.

Counter.Description: You can choose which counter you want to use. You can choose between: vanilla, mod

Days.Description: You can choose which day(s) to show. You can choose between: player, server

Advancements.Description: You can enable or disable the advancements.

Texts.Description: You can customize the texts here. Every text except Title Text what use JSON is using normal color codes.
